Text: This works it is the real 3dmark 11 However you need a key to use full version.

This is the full version, you will need a serial to run it in advanced mode/post multiple scores to 3dmark.com though.

D/L straight form futuremark at 6am PST release time then posted it up here.
Or you can just download officially from one of the many mirrors at: http://www.3DMark.com/3DMark11/Download-3DMark-11/
